description.narrative:
The O-based in Vietnam contributes to the effective and efficient delivery of Australian assistance to Vietnam through the provision of technical and administrative support to AusAID's incountry operations at office in Hanoi. Ho Chi Minh City office closed as at June 2008
O-based provides contractual and financial management support to AusAID's in-country operations in Vietnam. The O-based budget covers the provision of contracted Vietnamese personnel, equipment, short-term consultancies and other support costs to enable AusAID in Vietnam to deliver its responsibilities for program management and monitoring, policy analysis and engagement. The scope of O-based operations and funding levels are endorsed annually.
Australia’s aid program in Vietnam is undergoing a major process of change. This includes focus, mode of delivery and style of operation. The key driver of the change is the implemenation of the White Paper on Australian Aid. At the same time the program is changing in re
